page.title: 07FOOD
page.content:
{Vegetables and food.
Quite a few people grow their own vegetables and food in {Chilsworthy.} Some things need to be bought from shops, but most things can be grown. Things like potatoes ,peas,carrots and cabbages are grown in home gardens. These things can also be obtained from shops and grocers. When we did a survey on people's favourite meals, only seventeen people out of thirty four mentioned a meal with vegetables in it.Most people preferred meals using meat,egg and toast. Some gardens are not suitable to grow vegetables in because of too many stones or of a disease in the earth.When this happens,food has to be bought from shops and supermarkets in Holsworthy.
{by Louisa Herrero and Nicola Clay.
